briefTitle: Effect of Statin Therapy on Disease Progression in Autosomal Dominant Polycystic Kidney Disease (ADPKD)
officialTitle: Effect of Statin Therapy on Disease Progression in Autosomal Dominant Polycystic Kidney Disease
summary: The purpose of this study is to determine whether the medication pravastatin will ameliorate renal and cardiovascular disease over a 3-year period in children and young adults with autosomal dominant polycystic kidney disease (ADPKD).

primaryOutcome.measure: Percent of Participants Demonstrating 20% or More Increase in Total Kidney Volume
